data: “I wonder what has become of that everlasting Yankee? He promised to meet me here at noon, yet I have stood here and seen the shadows of these old pines lengthen for the last hour.”
Old Bear-Paw, the trapper king; or, The love of a Blackfoot queen
browsing: culture/civilization/society|browsing: literature|browsing: fiction|category: historical novels|category: romance|category: adventure|category: american literature
